name: Bunte Panzer
description:
This is Bunte Panzer, a top down arena tank game for Windows, Mac and Linux. It is my first game, written completely from scratch in Java.

Controls:

Player 1: WASD, Q, E

Player 2: Arrow Keys, SPACE, C

Player 3: on the Numblock: 8456, 7, 9

Enjoy and leave a feedback
